headline: Has KLA’s 92.5% Surge in 2025 Pushed Its Valuation Too Far?
summary: If you are wondering whether KLA is still worth buying after such a big run up, you are not alone. This article is going to unpack what the current share price really implies. The stock has climbed 92.5% year to date and 90.5% over the last year, building on multi year gains of 210.7% over three years and 396.4% over five years, so the market clearly sees something powerful in the story. Recent moves have been underpinned by growing enthusiasm around semiconductor capital spending and the...
